title: Multigrain seeded loaf
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) strong white (bread) flour', '200 g (7 oz) strong wholemeal (bread) flour', '100 g (3½ oz) buckwheat flour', '75 g (2½ oz) polenta', '2 tsp salt', '1 sachet easy-blend dried yeast, about 7 g', '1 tsp light muscovado sugar', '3 tbsp sunflower seeds', '2 tbsp pumpkin seeds', '2 tbsp linseeds', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '450 ml g (15 fl oz ) tepid water', 'a little semi-skimmed milk to glaze']
